MobileDragon reference manual. Class List

ColorRGBA color
CommonParticleSingle particle structure
CompletePolicyCompletePolicy represents template class that provides implementation of policies container to store complete policies
CompositePolicyCompositePolicy represents template class that provides implementation of policies composer to composite two policies
CustomDataCustomData represents custom data storage class
DummyBoxDummy box objects class
DummySphereDummySphere represents dummy sphere objects class
FixedFixed point real number
Font2DFont2D represents 2D font class
Font3D3d font created from one texture

IBtConnectionBluetooth endpoint connection interface
ImageStore images
InputProvides support for input devices
JointJoint represents joint object in Joint3DAnimation
Joint3DJoint Model
Joint3DAnimationJoint3DAnimation represents animation of joint model
Joint3DAnimationNodeNode in Joint Joint3DAnimation
Joint3DNodeJoint3DNode represents an 3d object (Object3D) with list of joints

Light3d light source
LightMapLightmap object

MaterialContains object's material information

MDGameBase class for MobileDragon application class
MDGamePreferencesStructure to hold application preferences
MDMLoadLoader of Mobile Dragon Model (MDM) file class
MusicRepresents .mod music
ObjectBase class for Objects that require reference - counting
Object3DCommon 3d object
ObjRefSmartPointer for Object<T> - derived classes
PackDirPacked directory storage system
ParticleManagerParticle Manager represents concrete particle system template class
Point2D point class
PortalPortal class
QuadIndexQuadIndex class represents set of indexes to describe square polygon
QuaternionQuaternion represents template quaternion class
RandomizeSimple pseudo-random number sequence generator
RectRect class stores the upper-left and lower-right corners coordinates of rectangle
Render2D2d graphics render class
Render3D3D render class
ResourceBinary resource in memory
Robot3D3d objects with own (local) and relative transformations
RoomRoom class
SoundRepresents .wav sound
SoundSystemProvides control over MobileDragon sound system
SphereSphere represents basic sphere class
